title: Paper Girls, Volume 2
description: The smash-hit series from BRIAN K. VAUGHAN and CLIFF CHIANG continues with a bold new direction, as intrepid young newspaper deliverers Erin, Mac, and Tiffany find themselves launched from 1988 to a distant and terrifying future...the year 2016.Collects PAPER GIRLS #6-10
author: Brian K. Vaughan
